thread.section_title: Government Policy, Business and Technology: i360 Gov
thread.title: Guide offers collaborative learning insight

title: Guide offers collaborative learning insight
text:
07 Guide offers collaborative learning insight 
eSchool News: A new resource aims to share tips on how to establish a collaborative environment in classrooms, and it also provides relevant and engaging lessons, organized by subject matter and grade level.Available for download at http://news.mimio.com/collaborate-to-the-core-2015-prat no charge, the 36-page guide includes “7 Tips to Your Collaborative Classroom Makeover,” which discusses how teachers can arrange their classroom to promote more collaborative learning.
